title: WikiArt Artwork Classification
description: Art classification by style, genre, and artist (Saleh & Elgammal, 2015). Classify paintings into artistic movements, genres, and predict artist attribution.
citation:

    title = "Large-scale Classification of Fine-Art Paintings: Learning The Right Metric on The Right Feature",
    author = "Saleh, Babak  and Elgammal, Ahmed",
    journal = "arXiv preprint arXiv:1505.00855",
    year = "2015",

}
